title: *Charming Studio Apartment in a Great Location* 962 3R
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties* We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building", '*Charming Studio Apartment in a Great Location*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '*SEPTEMBER 1ST MOVE-IN*', '1 month broker fee is due at the lease signing', '*The apartment features:*', 'Large Windows / Open Concept Kitchen with a Gas Stove / Bathroom with a Spacious Standing Shower / Exposed Brick Throughout / Dark Hardwood Floors / Original Decorative Fireplace / Secured Entrance /', '*Utilities are included in the rent!', 'Laundry in the building', 'A Step Away from the J Train at Kosciusko St Station & the Z Train at Gates Ave Station /', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $84,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome!', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
